name: Flashback Runner
description:
A procedurally generated runner inspired by the 80s culture. You will travel around a beach city full of houses, trees and beautiful beaches.

If you have luck, you will get to see the awesome sunrise and sunset in this fictional city from the 80s.

Use AWSD to move. If you collide and the camera turns upside down, just press R to reset. Also, you can press L to turn on/off the headlights from the car.

Have fun! (:

DISCLAIMER: This game used music and art from various arts! I do not own the art assets used! I also do not pretend to sell this game as it was just developed for learning purposes.
